enableDynamicTags.title: dynamic new-blocklevel-tags
enableDynamicTags.description: all tags with '-' separator will be added to new-blocklevel-tags. e.g angular bootstrap: uib-alert

enableDynamicBody.title: dynamic show-body-only
enableDynamicBody.description: set show-body-only true if no body tag exists

fileSearchEnabled.title: enable file search
fileSearchEnabled.description: enable search for tidy html 5 options file

secureTagCount.title: warn on tag count change
secureTagCount.description: show warning if tag count is changed
